title: How to Find Scrap Metal

steps.headline: Collect any kind of scrap metal like cool drink cans, old wires, nuts & bolts, screws, bicycle parts, car parts, old car batteries, knives forks & spoons etc.
Remove anything that is not metal like plastic etc.
steps.description: (You get more money if you bring in anything that is metal only instead of wires with plastic coatings.)

steps.headline: Separate the different kinds of metals.
steps.description: By separating the different kinds of metal you get more money in your pocket.

steps.headline: Take it to your local scrap metal dealer.
steps.description: They pay you per weight of each kind of metal.

text: Collect any kind of scrap metal like cool drink cans, old wires, nuts & bolts, screws, bicycle parts, car parts, old car batteries, knives forks & spoons etc.  Remove anything that is not metal like plastic etc. (You get more money if you bring in anything that is metal only instead of wires with plastic coatings.) Separate the different kinds of metals. By separating the different kinds of metal you get more money in your pocket. Take it to your local scrap metal dealer. They pay you per weight of each kind of metal.
